description_txt: stated on April 30, 2018 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "You know what Amazon paid in federal income taxes last year? Zero."

description_txt: stated on May 1, 2018 in a debate:
quote_txt: "You (Evan Jenkins) said your philosophy was ‘progressive mainstream’ back in 2003."

quote_txt: "All the things Patrick (Morrisey) is saying — (that I supported) Hillary Clinton, cap and trade, Planned Parenthood — PolitiFact went through each and every allegation and said, ‘False, False, False, False.’ "

description_txt: stated on May 1, 2018 in a tweet:

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2018 in a campaign fundraising letter:

description_txt: stated on April 17, 2018 in a news conference:

description_txt: stated on April 28, 2018 in a speech in Washington, Mich.:
quote_txt: "We have spent $7 trillion, trillion with a T, $7 trillion in the Middle East."

description_txt: stated on April 23, 2018 in a debate:

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2018 in a blog post:

description_txt: stated on April 23, 2018 in a debate:

description_txt: stated on April 26, 2018 in in a hearing:

description_txt: stated on April 20, 2018 in in a press release:

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2018 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: "We have laws on the books where people can walk right up to our ports of entry, say ‘I have a credible fear of persecution,’ and we bring them in. We don’t send them back."

description_txt: stated on April 25, 2018 in a tweet:

description_txt: stated on April 26, 2018 in an interview on "Fox & Friends":

description_txt: stated on April 22, 2018 in in a tweet:

description_txt: stated on April 19, 2018 in a radio interview:
